Name: Maintain
Project Activity: Update the WHO/UNICEF JMP R data package to represent the latest figures published, add functions for automatic updates and testing.

Name: Maintain
Project Activity: Liaise with JMP on issues identified in their data files to improve the (automated) data pipeline and create greater awareness.

Name: Maintain
Project Activity: Provide helper functions to shape data for better useability by researchers.

Name: Maintain
Project Activity: Update ORD documentation to provide examples on how to load and transform the datasets for analysis.

Name: Extend
Project Activity: Engage with authoritative data providers to determine feasibility and level of collaboration to produce an R package for WASH economic data.

Name: Extend
Project Activity: Develop and publish an R package dataset for at least one of the identified  authoritative data providers.

Name: Extend
Project Activity: Add organisation identifiers in the dataset in collaboration with the data provider and a public registry (https://org-id.guide/ and/or Wikidata). With identifiers, researchers can leverage metadata on the type of investors for analysis.

Name: Extend
Project Activity: Provide documentation on how to use the economic data.

Name: Disseminate
Project Activity: Host a webinar on innovations in WASH open data practices and highlight ongoing work under WP1 and WP2.

Name: Disseminate
Project Activity: Host  a session at Stockholm World Water Week “Unlocking the hidden potential of open WASH data”.

Name: Disseminate
Project Activity: Invite WASHWeb and openwashdata communities and others to join discussion groups for all thematic areas (1. Using Data Better, 2. Accountability, 3. Systems Strengthening, 4. Social Justice & Privacy) and facilitate ongoing conversations (live and in-chat).
